cards.rules_text:
At the beginning of your end step, gain 1 life. Then if you've paid life this turn, surveil 1. [i](Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)[/i]
Sacrifice Dusk Harvest: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Summoned by sacred flame, the gathering spirits share wisdom and regret in equal measure.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Kicker–{1}{W}, Discard a card. [i](You may pay an additional {1}{W} and discard a card as you cast this spell.)[/i]
Target attacking creature you control gets +2/+1 until end of turn. If Fiery Reprieve was kicked, remove that creature from combat, and it deals damage equal to its power to target player or planeswalker.
At the beginning of your end step, if you have no cards in hand, create a 1/1 white Faerie creature token with flying.
cards.flavor_text: [i]A drop of resin to preserve our future.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Tap target creature, then put X stun counters on it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]A humbler soul might have recognized a potential apprentice. Tiberius saw nothing more than a thieving brat.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
First strike
As long as you've discarded a card this turn, Petal Collector gets +1/+0 and has flying.
cards.flavor_text: [i]A traditional burden in times of peace, to be cast aside as tensions rise.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Dreaded Needle deals 2 damage to any target. When a permanent dealt damage this way dies this turn, return it to the battlefield under your control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Driven mad by pain. Stitched together by threads of doubt.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Shadow, lifelink [i](This creature can block or be blocked by only creatures with shadow.)[/i]
{1{W}U}: Chérie the Untethered phases out. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Every second she lingers is a second wasted.”
—Brother Ollie, traveling monk[/i]

cards.rules_text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. If {R}{W} was spent to cast this spell, creatures you control get +2/+0 and Nomads you control gain vigilance until the end of your next turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Long after its fall, the Empire's abandoned strongholds provide shelter and arms to the very peoples once persecuted by it.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance, haste
Whenever Nima or another Nomad you control deals combat damage to a player, you may pay {1}{G}. If you do, return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Once painful memories washed away, old relics find new life in young hands.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Defender
{2R}: Sulking Recluse loses defender until end of turn and attacks this turn if able. Any player may activate this ability.
cards.flavor_text: [i]In the ancient ruins, ogres sought an escape from a century of violence. Foolish poachers fail to leave them undisturbed.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Haste
{R}, {T}: Up to two target creatures you control with total power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The woods hold no secrets from the wolf.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
Whenever Imperial Stalwart deals combat damage to a player, it gains indestructible until your next turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]To protect a crumbling empire brings no glory; only frail hope for her kin.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever a creature you control attacks and isn't blocked, Vicious Pursuit deals 1 damage to the defending player and you gain 1 life.
At end of combat on your turn, if you've gained 3 or more life this turn, draw a card.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Vagrants become thieves. Thieves become prey.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Whenever you cast a spell, create a number of 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens equal to that spell's reverence to black. [i](Each {B} in a spell's mana cost counts towards its reverence to black.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]Though old homes are forgotten, still they long for a place of belonging.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Stalking Draugr gets +1/+1 for each other Zombie creature you control.
Whenever Stalking Draugr attacks or dies, you may exile a creature card from your graveyard. If you do, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

Whenever one or more cards leave your graveyard, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token with decayed.
[i]Coven[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if you control three or more creatures with different powers, you may search your library for a creature card, put it into your graveyard, then shuffle.

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has defender and “At the beginning of each upkeep, put a spore counter on this creature.”
{4}{G}, Sacrifice Adnascentia: Remove all spore counters from enchanted creature and create that many 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Blind to the enemy growing within, now, he rests.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Reach
[i]Raid[/i] – When Unseen Hand enters the battlefield, if you attacked this turn, you may destroy target tapped creature.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Though only death and blood could have driven them to such frenzy, she would not waste this hunt in mourning.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Until end of turn, whenever a creature target player controls attacks or blocks, put a stun counter on a land that player controls.
cards.flavor_text: [i]The sun cleanses the demons from our fields and from our hearts.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to any target. Sacrifice that creature at the beginning of the next end step.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Vengeful flames reduce all to ash, but her ashes shall be the merrier.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Mill four cards, then return a permanent card from your graveyard to your hand. If that card is a land card, you may return it to the battlefield tapped instead.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“Nature tells its stories with more depth and passion than any book yet written.”
—Sorrel, reclusive historian[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Vigilance
Shrinking Lily can't be blocked as long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn.
Discard a card: Shrinking Lily phases out. [i](Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]A flicker of eyes both prying and shy.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Each player sacrifices each creature they control that dealt damage this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“What doesn't kill me…”[/i]
cards.rules_text2:
Aftermath [i](Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)[/i]
Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. You lose life equal to its mana value.

cards.rules_text:
Haste
Pay 2 life, {Q}: When Maeve dies this turn, return her to the battlefield under your control.
cards.flavor_text: [i]She'd rather be caught dead than caught empty-handed.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Fervid [i](As two or more creatures you control attack or become unblocked, you may cast this. If you do, it enters the battlefield tapped and attacking.)[/i]
As long as Nesting Furie is attacking, it has flying and other creatures you control get +1/+0.

When Chortle of Selkies enters the battlefield, if it isn't a token, create a creature token that is a copy of it.
Chortle of Selkies can't be blocked unless each other attacking creature with the same name is also blocked.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Caught laughing, but never alone.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Fervid [i](As two or more creatures you control attack or become unblocked, you may cast this. If you do, it enters the battlefield tapped and attacking.)[/i]
Whenever Thrice-horned Forerunner deals combat damage to a player, for each of two target permanents, untap it if it's a creature or if you control an Island.
Counter target spell that targets unless its controller pays {1}. If they do, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
cards.flavor_text: [i]A witch's curse cannot survive the horn's purifying influence, but attracting such foul magic to herself is not without risk.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever Sibelle of Sacred Horn is dealt damage, you gain that much life.
{R}: Target creature blocks Sibelle this turn if able. This ability costs {1} more to activate for each time it has been activated this turn.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Witch she may be, yet still she prays for them. And for she is too meek to defend herself, they will never stop hunting her for it.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
As Vengeful Brutis enters the battlefield, choose another creature you control. Damage dealt to that creature isn't lethal as long as you control both creatures.
Whenever the chosen creature is dealt damage, Brutis deals twice that much damage to target opponent.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Cruelty is no curse, yet he is the cure.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Attacking creatures you control that are lands and/or tokens have deathtouch.
Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. If you do, sacrifice that creature or an Aura attached to it.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Rumors. Tumors. Equally deadly.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Enchant land you control
Enchanted land is a 4/3 Spirit creature with trample and haste. It's still a land.
Umbra armor [i](If enchanted permanent would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]In these woods, it is the shadows that lurk.[/i]

cards.rules_text: When this creature enters, surveil 2, then you may return a land card from your graveyard to the battlefield. If you don't, create a 2/1 green Ouphe creature token.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Inchhikers will travel remarkable distances in search of a friend. At their height, compassion ceases to be kindness; it is survival.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Put a +1/+1 counter on each of X target lands you control. They each become 0/0 Spirit creatures. They're still lands.
Until end of turn, creatures you control
gain haste and protection from creatures and spells with greater mana value. [i](They can't be blocked, targeted, or dealt damage by creatures and spells with greater mana value.)[/i]

Your maximum hand size is two.
You may play cards that were put into your graveyard from your library this turn.
cards.flavor_text:
[i]“After I lost all else, [/i]she[i] found [/i]me[i].”
—Kikue, first child from stone[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Activated abilities of your commander cost {2} less to activate. This effect can't reduce the mana in that cost to less than one mana.
{2G}, Sacrifice this creature: Counter target activated or triggered ability.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Rested fields bring fuller harvests.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Each player searches their library for a card, puts it into their graveyard, then shuffles. The owner of each nonland card put into a graveyard this way with the lowest mana value may cast it without paying its mana cost.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Kikue awoke to a world grown vast.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you lose life, choose one–
• Mill half that many cards, rounded up.
• Shuffle up to that many target cards from your graveyard into your library.
{X}{R}{R}, {T}, Exile X cards from your graveyard: Kikue deals damage to any target equal to the number of card types among cards exiled this way.
